game.name: SCUM
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, 통계
game.shortDescription: Traverse punishing environments, looting, crafting and evading the constant threats to your life. The unprecedented levels of character customization and progression are your ultimate tools for survival.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Traverse punishing environments, looting, crafting and evading the constant threats to your life. The unprecedented levels of character customization and progression are your ultimate tools for survival.

reviewHighlights.text: 정발하면서 한국어를 뺏어간 미친놈들 돈내놔라 이놈들아
